name: Armed Response
description: A remote facility, built as a prison with a secret super lie detector, is compromised and the five guarding it are possibly dead. An armed team of six investigates what's wrong.

review.author: Badmovieboy123
review.heading: If you need explanation I got you.
review.reviewBody: Long story short. An AI interrogation program wreaks havoc on a group of soldiers in an abandoned prison. Listen yall hate everything sure Wesley snipes did nothing for me here...but here me out...seth the Monday night messiah in a movie with Wesley snipes and Anne henche. It's alright with me. Was it shawshank redemption no...but was it good enough to waste an hour and a half on ...yes. Not sure what the genre would be...thriller action horror whatever it is...hulk hogan's made worse I promise.
